actions.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment and on the resolution without objection.
On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment makes in order the text of an amendment offered by Representative McCaul of Texas as if printed in House Report 113-41 and provides for the offering of the amendment by Representative McCaul or his designee during consideration of H.R. 624.
purpose: An amendment to include the text of an amendment offered by Representative McCaul of Texas in House Report 113-41 and provide for the offering of the amendment by Representative McCaul or his designee.
